svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/133.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="26.1.0" scale="1" border="0"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="oGt7gixbmbRS9VxZeW-b"> <mxGraphModel dx="794" dy="412" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-1" value="<div style=""><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">1. Create Account in Azure Portal&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">using tech@gmail.com. will get Tenant id &amp; domain name.</span></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="560" y="53" width="240" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-4" value="<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">2. Automatically a<span>&nbsp;</span></span><b style="forced-color-adjust: none; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">Default Directory</b><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><span>&nbsp;</span>will be created with unique&nbsp;<b style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(251, 251, 251);">Primary domain</b>&nbsp;after create an account in Azure</span>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="53" width="260" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-5" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="105" width="690" height="260" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-6" value="<b><font style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Default Directory</font></b><div><font style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><font style="font-size: 8px;"><b>Tanent ID :&nbsp;</b></font><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: var(--ff-mono); font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; font-weight: inherit; white-space: inherit; text-align: left;"><font style="font-size: 8px;">1234-YYYY-HHHH-GGGG...</font></span></font></div><div><font style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: var(--ff-mono); font-style: inherit; font-variant-ligatures: inherit; font-variant-caps: inherit; white-space: inherit; text-align: left;"><font style="font-size: 8px;"><b>Primary Domain </b><span style="font-weight: inherit;">: tech.</span></font></span></font><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 8px;"><font color="#ffffff">onmicrosoft.com</font></span></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#000000;strokeColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="335" y="50" width="170" height="55" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-7" value="3. Create a subscription before use any resource" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="130" width="90" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-10" value="<b><font style="font-size: 14px;">Azure Active Directory - Tenant, Subscription and Directory</font></b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="220" y="10" width="400" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-11" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="135" y="135" width="305" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-12" value="<font style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Subscription 1</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=light-dark(#2372e1, #1d293b);strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="135" y="135" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-13" value="<div><b>RG1 (resource group)</b> inside subscription for separate billing</div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#82b366;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="175" width="120" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-14" value="<b>RG2 (resource group)</b> inside subscription separate billing" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#82b366;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="175" width="120" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-15" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="470" y="135" width="305" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-16" value="<font style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Subscription 2</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=light-dark(#2372e1, #1d293b);strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="470" y="135" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-18" value="<div><b>RG3 (resource group)</b> inside subscription for separate billing</div><div><br></div><div><br></div><div><br></div><div><font style="font-size: 12px;">For Creating virtual machine,&nbsp;</font></div><div><font style="font-size: 12px;">need <b>Subscription </b>&amp; <b>Resource group</b></font></div><div><br></div><div><br></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#82b366;strokeWidth=2;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="490" y="175" width="270" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-19" value="Virtual Machine" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeColor=#FF3333;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="510" y="225" width="240" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2hNXxdaZzxLUuH1hye88-20" value="<b>NOTE:</b> User can have 1. Multiple subscriptions in one Tanent Id 2. Multiple resource groups in one Subscription 3. Multiple domains under a single Tanent ID 4. Multiple Tenant IDs with same azure account" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="370" width="690" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
